alt.therapyIcon: Ek chitra jismein sir pe phool hai
alt.courseIcon: Ek chitra hai jismein play karne wale button ka icon, ek tikon jo seedhi taraf point kar raha hai. Uske aage ek chota suraj hai
alt.notesIcon: Ek chitra hai jismein mobile phone ke andar beech mein ek dil bana hua hai
alt.chatIcon: Do speech bubbles gulabi background ke peeche mil rahe hain. Pehle wale mein ek gulabi dil hai. Doosre wale mein seedhi liney hain.
alt.activitiesIcon: A book with a small yellow fire on its cover.
alt.groundingIcon: A twig with small pink flowers.
